input.code: This page is the main access point to the course material. Note that every page allows you to toggle between a text and a presentation mode. In the lectures we will mostly use the presentation view, but both are essentially based on the same content.This is the content of the course: * [Logistics](/template/statnlpbook/04_compgi19/00_logistics) * [Introduction](/template/statnlpbook/04_compgi19/01_intro) * Tutorials * [Welcome](/template/statnlpbook//05_tutorial/00_intro_to_scala_tutorial_welcome) * [Part 1: Scala Basics](/template/statnlpbook//05_tutorial/01_intro_to_scala_part1) * [Part 2: Scala Collections](/template/statnlpbook//05_tutorial/02_intro_to_scala_part2) * Lectures * Tokenization: [Notes](/template/statnlpbook/01_tasks/00_tokenization) * Language Models: [Notes](/template/statnlpbook/01_tasks/01_languagemodels) * Word-Based Machine Translation: [Notes](/template/statnlpbook/01_tasks/02_wordmt) * Syntactic Parsing: [Slides](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ebcm16944a5cppq/syntax.pdf?dl=0), [Notes](/template/statnlpbook/01_tasks/0x_parsing) * Text Classification: [Slides](https://www.dropbox.com/s/hwgi2u59lciwwd1/BeyondMLE.pdf?dl=0), [Notes](/template/statnlpbook/01_tasks/0x_textclassify) * Sequence Models: [Slides](https://www.dropbox.com/s/zvlq6vllxjci0wh/sequence-models.pdf?dl=0) * Relation Extraction: [Slides](https://www.dropbox.com/s/1igf5vm95kwweul/relation-extraction.pdf?dl=0) * Open Problems * Joint Inference: [Slides](https://www.dropbox.com/s/byepcue14ebgd0t/joint-inference.pdf?dl=0) * Unsupervised Parsing: [Slides](https://www.dropbox.com/s/r0fo4d551shddzm/unsupervised%20dep%20parsing.pdf?dl=0) * Representation Learning * Word Representation: [Slides](https://www.dropbox.com/s/sva0r38sm9t1itn/representations.pdf?dl=0) * Recursive Neural Netowrks: [Slides](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ba4oo018qykbruu/recursive_neural_networks.pdf?dl=0) * Sentence Representation: [Slides](https://www.dropbox.com/s/zl8qj6aoqxzp599/recurrent_neural_networks.pdf?dl=0)
